question: A friend you made while you were studying abroad has written to ask you for help in finding a job in your country. You have heard about a job in a local company that might be suitable for him/her. Write a letter to this friend. In your letter • Tell your friend about the job and what sort of work it involves • Say why you think the job would be suitable for him/her • Explain how to apply for the job
text: Hope this letter finds you well. I'm writing to let you know about the job that you have requested for a full-time in my country.

Well, I came to know that the company called Tata consultancy services is hiring for a leadership position to guide an Artificial Intelligence project. The job responsibilities are centred around managing a team of fifteen developers whose job  is to provide machine codes.

I think this job suits you because you had recently graduated in computer science. Moreover, I know that your ambition is to work in the Information Technology sector. I believe that it would be the right choice for you to start your career.

I have added the website link to post your resume under the careers section. I want you to apply for this position immediately. Please send the completed form to me which I could forward to the manager for review.
All the best. See you soon.
